title: Razdolnoye, Rodinsky District, Altai Krai
content:
Razdolnoye (Russian: Раздольное) is a rural locality (a selo) and the administrative center of Razdolnensky Selsoviet, Rodinsky District, Altai Krai, Russia. The population was 835 as of 2013.[2] There are 10 streets.

Razdolnoye is located 21 km west of Rodino (the district's administrative centre) by road. Markovka and Rodino are the nearest rural localities.[3]

This Rodinsky District location article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
